title: PV CELL
fullText:
most elementary device that exhibits the photovoltaic effect (i.e. the direct non-thermal conversion of radiant energy into electrical energy)
Note 1 to entry: The preferred term is "solar photovoltaic cell" or "photovoltaic cell", colloquially referred to as a "solar cell".
[SOURCE: IEC TS 61836, 3.1.48.1]
[SOURCE: IEC TS 61836, 3.1.48.4]
